message: @djthread textmate 2 is next big version of TextMate
There is a lot of features to be finished for Kod.
lol I know... What I really meant was that I gave up waiting a long time ago. MacVim for me!
Used it a lot many years ago, used TM for my PHP coding for 2-3 years, but as of maybe 6+ months now, I'm back to Vim, taking it seriously, and loving all the power.

Def. I mean even if TM2 somehow does appear, it's probably too late for me to switch back. :) I still use TM for quickie things, though. MacVim is for serious code manipulation, and I'm in love with it for that stuff.
If you're listening though, Allan, I still want TM2!!!! :D
